movies.name: PROJECT MOON BASE
movies.description: In a future 1970, the United States is considering building bases on the Moon. Colonel Briteis, Major Bill Moore, and Doctor Wernher are sent to orbit the Moon to survey landing sites for future lunar missions.

movies.name: VILLAGE OF THE GIANTS
movies.description: Teenagers ingest a substance that causes them to grow to giant size and take over a small town.

movies.name: DANGER: DIABOLIC
movies.description: A secret agent must stop a mad scientist from unleashing a deadly virus on the world.

movies.name: WILD REBELS
movies.description: A race car driver goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

movies.name: SECRET AGENT SUPER DRAGON
movies.description: A secret agent battles a criminal organization planning to take over the world.

movies.name: CATALINA CAPER
movies.description: A group of treasure hunters search for a stolen scroll that leads to a hidden fortune.

movies.name: THE GIANT SPIDER INVASION
movies.description: A small town is terrorized by giant alien spiders.

movies.name: SANTA CLAUS CONQUERS MARTIANS
movies.description: Martians kidnap Santa Claus to bring joy to their children.

movies.name: THE TOUCH OF SATAN
movies.description: A man falls in love with a woman who may be the daughter of Satan.

movies.name: TIME CHASERS
movies.description: A man invents a time machine and must stop a corporation from altering history.

movies.name: MANOS: THE HANDS OF FATE
movies.description: A family stumbles upon a cult worshipping a deity named Manos.

movies.name: THE GIANT GILA MONSTER
movies.description: A small town is terrorized by a giant lizard.

movies.name: THE KILLER SHREWS
movies.description: A group of people are hunted by giant, venomous shrews.

movies.name: THE SKY DIVERS
movies.description: A group of skydivers get caught up in a smuggling ring.

movies.name: TRACK OF THE MOON BEAST
movies.description: A man is transformed into a monster after being struck by a meteorite.
